title: MHRA Good Clinical and Laboratory Practice Symposia (11 and 12 February 2025)

content.text: Come and join the next MHRA Symposia in February 2025 and hear the latest on Good Clinical Practice (GCP) and Good Laboratory Practice (GLP) in the UK from MHRA inspectors and regulators.
Registration is available on the dedicated symposia website for in-person attendance in West London and virtual attendance from anywhere in the world.
This symposium is the first for over 5 years solely dedicated to hearing from the MHRA GCP Team.  The agenda is packed with educational and insightful content including:
This event also affords the opportunity to ask questions of GCP inspectors, both at panel sessions and during Inspector Surgeries.
For more information and to book your space, visit https://mhragcp-labs.co.uk.
